#summary Dynamic DNS updates
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

There is a dynamic DNS system that comes with BIND9. {{{nsupdate}}} is the program.

Sample code of how to update a DNS record

{{{
nsupdate
> server xyz.com
> zone nattt
> update add 5.nattt. 1 TYPE65324 \# 10 46 b0 34 63 26 94 0a 00 00 05     
> show
> send
}}}
